show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Institutionalized Stupidity, American-Style
content:
The American public’s bias against science. Preferred are bumper-sticker simplicities and faith. <!--more--> People read less, watch less news and embrace stupidity.
Language has deteriorated.
Universities don’t educate anymore: they train students to get jobs.
Americans systematically vote against their own interests through ignorance.
It is getting harder to avoid prosecution for laws we break that we’re not even aware of.
More evidence against ‘the recovery’.
Declines are evident in all areas.
Real household income has been declining since 2000 and in some cases long before that – except in Washington DC where it hit an all-time high in 2012.
Federal government excessive spending, perhaps?
Analysts are usually wrong in their forecasts.
They are all currently bullish and optimistic on the economy.
Some burgeoning money supply statistics.
